title: i only see ppl complain about yasuo in bronze silver elo
body:
no one else in other elos seem to have this issue

think about that for a second before u claim how op yasuo isnt

replies.body:
He's zero fun to for anyone other than the person playing as him, no matter what ELO.

Also, if only people in silver and lower hate playing against him, then why is he the third-most-banned champion in Platinum+?
Only Rengar and Kha'zix have higher ban rates, and those two are currently considered to be major balance issues.
His ban rate is higher than Syndra and Vayne, who both have a significantly higher win rate, and, in the case of Vayne, almost three times his playrate.

id have to see some proof on yasuo being banned in plat and above cuz THAT sounds silly

also its really not hard dealing with him

i bet ur issue is u dont pick champs that crush him for being a glasscannon melee carry

He currently takes both the 4th and 5th place for most banned in Plat+ Elo...it's pretty easy to look up

http://www.champion.gg/statistics/#?sortBy=general.banRate&order=descend

>
> id have to see some proof on yasuo being banned in plat and above cuz THAT sounds silly

http://champion.gg/champion/Yasuo

38.02% ban rate.  Champion GG analyzes platinum ranked games.

Why are you trying to start a fight?
He's not going to remain to reply to this.

Being able to crush him if you pick one of the champions that counter him doesn't make him any less unhealthy.

Being forced to play those champions isn't fun either, and doesn't even work if you pick before him unless you play them every single time just in case.

as a yasuo main, i agree with you com fucking pletely

on one hand, hes right, the MAJORITY (NOT ALL FUCKING MAJORITY) of yasuo qqers are ppl who dont know how to stop him

but on the other hand, you are right, i know for a fact hes fun af, but not to play against, but 2 things...

1) higher elo ban him because there are more people that know how to play yasuo well and they jsut dont wanna deal with it
2) rengar and khaÂ´zix having balance issues doesnt mean much, its just like the riven holocaust of s5 where riven had an insane ban rate over people crying about her
I don't think Yasuo's Op. Just I hate playing against him because his kit is cancer inducing.
his kit isnt cancer though its very very very easy to stop him

nonononononononoon

yasuo main gunna speak up here

FUCK 
YOU
1. it is hard to stop, thats why people abuse it, however, taht doesnt mean taht the people qqing are right either
Fuck yasuo. I was gold when I said fuck yasuo and I'm still gold saying fuck yasuo. I don't care if I win against him or lose against him he is so stupid to play against.

as a yasuo main, i approve, he is cancer to play against but hes just so
damn
FUN

wait a second

both faker and apdo say theres literally no way to not lose against a yasuo in lane
lmao when if that was true how come he doesnt get played in lcs ? lmao
maybe because LCS is completely different than solo queue? I get really tired of the "if it's not in LCS it's not op" argument because lcs and everything else aren't even comparable

it really is though if a pro can win lane hard as a certain champ then what makes u think they wont play it

they played cait and jhin becauyse of how good their lane phase was they even had to take mf support because of how good zyra was in lane

just face it yasuo is not op he is very very far from it

so in lcs they played trundle , poppy , ashe , sivir 

are they OP and broken ?

*sighs* you don't get it

lane dominant matchups were favored due to the teamwork from roams and synergized tower dives, as well as the multitude of other things that are accomplished when you have 5 pro players who have been practicing for years together.

Yasuo is easily shut down by a coordinated team, which is extremely hard to find in solo queue but pretty much defines the existence of LCS.

*that* is why yasuo wasn't picked in the LCS. Also, Yasuo *was* picked against Ball's Darius, an extremely stupid matchup to pick Yasuo in btw, 2 years ago I think. So to pretend like Yasuo has never seen the light of pro play is simply wrong

junglers are just way too strong and yasuo doesn't have the kit to escape jungle ganks.

thats literally like asking why not just play lane bullies only?

> [{quoted}](name=KirbyCake,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=81KW2wTw,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2016-12-05T01:50:05.263+0000)
>

> 
> both faker and apdo say theres literally no way to not lose against a yasuo in lane

Got a source?

> [{quoted}](name=PermabannedGaren,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=81KW2wTw,comment-id=00040001,timestamp=2016-12-05T02:04:19.787+0000)
>
> Got a source?

Play sivir and press E
Play Yasuo and press W. Block 10x more than Sivir ever could.

1 auto = about 100 dmg
1 chogath ult= about 1000 true damage 

yasuo windwall + autos = 1000 dmg blocked
windwall + cho ult = 0 dmg blocked

sivir spellshield + autos = 0 dmg blocked
spellshield + cho ult = 1000 dmg blocked

doesnt seen like 10 times to me :l

I like how you just cherry picked the scenario that catered to your side of the argument.

First off, Yasuo can block multiple autos from multiple champions. Second off, Yasuo blocks every projectile in the game, and blocks multiple projectiles. Third off, you assumed Cho'Gath ult did 1000 true damage, but then proceeded to assume an auto only did 100 damage. Cho'Gath ult only does 1000 true damage when it's late game or he's crazy fed, meanwhile autos from ADCs can get up to 800+ or even more (plus their projectiles, and other autos, plus mages projectiles, support CC etc.). 

Plus, you are assuming you are **_only_** against a Cho'Gath. There are a lot of other champions in this game besides Cho'Gath, and I can **_sure as hell guarantee_** there will be quite of a bit of projectiles, **_plus a guaranteed ADC_** to block.

Sivir can choose to block one spell, which she has to choose to block between a high damage ability or CC. Meanwhile Yasuo can block your damage and your CC.

ehhhhhhhhhhhh
i mean there are ways, theyre clearly exaggerating but its the draven effect

not that hard, but if youre really good, youre unstoppable

Um people complain about him in gold as well.

I don't ever ban him but he is often banned.
windwall needs a nerf that is a busted asss ability similar to jax counter strike.
Except you can actually play around Jax's E for the most part due to it only blocking autos and not **_every projectile_** (which is a very broad classification as most of you may know).

thats my point, windwall is so so so stupid and busted,,,,,, people who say yas is fine and windwall isnt op are people who use him and be lik ejust play around it .... that stupid fucking ability has cost me countless games and i mean countless games
i just find his wind wall irritating.
maybe u should wait till he uses it before u blow ur load

then while you're waiting he's just allowed to kill you? You understand that being forced to hold all of your abilities makes 0 sense because...you know...you need to use them to fight while yasuo has the rest of his kit to fight?

lol then find ways around it bait it out with something else

or dont pick a skill shot reliant champ ahainst yasuo
No, literally everyone complains about him. Bronze just complains the most.
I am in a low elo, and I don't think Yasuo is much of a problem. After fighting him enough times, his mechanics become easier to counter and predict. W.e.
